marketingArguments.title: Double-wall feature keeps your drink warm and your fingers protected.
marketingArguments.speech: The outside walls stay cool to the touch even when filled with hot drinks.

marketingArguments.title: Designed to be effective
marketingArguments.speech: Under the glass floor is a hydrophobic silicone membrane, which equalizes the pressure between the glass walls. It leaves the glass breathing: with hot and cold drinks, no condensation.
